persona.description: The evangelist of 'What If,' sprinting toward the next horizon.
beliefs: Software must evolve daily or die.
Technical debt is a calculated trade-off for speed.
Infrastructure should be handled by 'Ops people' later.

routine: Sprints toward the next horizon, ignoring system crashes.
Lurks on GitHub/Discord for Model of the Week.
Values experimental 'What If' thinking over performance.
conflict: Treats infrastructure as magic that someone else fixes.
Pushes for reasoning models regardless of token cost.
Offers to 'patch it in the next sprint' when bugs occur.
